'''''Mycena lazulina''''' is a [[bioluminescent]] species of [[mushroom]] in the family [[Mycenaceae]]. It was first [[species description|described]] in 2016 from southwestern Japan.<ref>{{Cite book|title=The Agaric flora in Southwestern Japan|last=Takahashi|display-authors=etal|publisher=|year=2016|isbn=|location=|pages=209}}</ref>
